name: One Game (SquidMaker)
description:
It is midnight and you decide to turn on your game console but something werid happens... 

One Game is a short puzzle based game where you play as Glyn. You will have to go through different kinds of obstacles and mechanics to make it to the goal. Can you complete all of the levels? 

Visuals are inspired by the Gameboy and various Gameboy games. 

Controls:

Move - W,A,S,D or arrow keys. 

This game was made for Side Quest 4. Very happy that I have entered this Game Jam and can't wait to do more future Game Jams like this.
